actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Motion to Discharge Committee Filed by D'Amours. Discharge Petition No: 01.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on Ways and Means.  Report No: 98-119.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure H.R.2973 Passed House in Lieu.

official_title: A bill to repeal sections 302 through 308 of the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982, which impose withholding on interest and dividends.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 to repeal the provisions which require the withholding of tax on interest and dividends.

titles.title: A bill to repeal sections 302 through 308 of the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982, which impose withholding on interest and dividends.
